医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
美国国立卫生研究院拨款 1800 万美元用于开发新型基孔肯雅疫苗Access to Advanced Health Institute (AAHI) 今天宣布，它已获得美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 的 1800 万美元资助，用于开发针对基孔肯雅病毒的温度稳定、单剂量候选疫苗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/NIH-awards-2418-million-to-develop-novel-chikungunya-vaccine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/NIH-awards-2418-million-to-develop-novel-chikungunya-vaccine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=37191530-fbf0-443d-b98b-ebf4c2e029bf Thu, 03 Aug 2023 10:08:39 -0400 NIH awards $18 million to develop novel chikungunya vaccine
逆转 β 细胞衰竭：2 型糖尿病治疗的一种有前景的方法研究人员检查了有关胰腺β细胞衰竭的原因和影响的现有证据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Reversing-ceb2-cell-failure-A-promising-approach-for-type-2-diabetes-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Reversing-ceb2-cell-failure-A-promising-approach-for-type-2-diabetes-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=37b48a3c-3139-4d25-b1af-fb6f90b8f085 Thu, 03 Aug 2023 10:04:00 -0400 Reversing β-cell failure: A promising approach for type 2 diabetes treatment
研究揭示了中国云南省蜱虫的微生物多样性宣布在 Zoonoses 杂志上发表新文章。蜱是多种人畜共患疾病的专性吸血媒介。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Study-reveals-high-microbial-diversity-in-ticks-from-Yunnan-Province-China.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Study-reveals-high-microbial-diversity-in-ticks-from-Yunnan-Province-China.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8f9fb77b-eb41-4b67-9d3d-0261b3b27f4a Thu, 03 Aug 2023 09:55:36 -0400 Study reveals high microbial diversity in ticks from Yunnan Province, China
创新的 3D 细胞培养平台可以取代动物研究PeptiMatrix 是诺丁汉大学最新的衍生公司，提供创新的 3D 细胞培养平台，旨在取代在研究中使用动物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Innovative-3D-cell-culture-platform-could-replace-the-use-of-animals-in-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Innovative-3D-cell-culture-platform-could-replace-the-use-of-animals-in-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c9095630-9018-425c-b26c-7b3315fb4dd0 Thu, 03 Aug 2023 09:45:36 -0400 Innovative 3D cell culture platform could replace the use of animals in research

黑人和非黑人成年人之间的中风危险因素差异可以通过重症监护来解决患有中风的黑人成年人和非黑人成年人之间存在显着的中风危险因素差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Stroke-risk-factor-disparities- Between-Black-and-non-Black-adults-may-be-resolved-with-intense-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Stroke-risk-factor-disparities- Between-Black-and-non-Black-adults-may-be-resolved-with-intense-care.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8be24f50-59d5-4774-a8fc-9d7f555dda36 Thu, 03 Aug 2023 09:21:28 -0400 Stroke risk factor disparities between Black and non-Black adults may be resolved with intensive care
格拉茨工业大学的研究人员对光激活蛋白质开关有了新的认识格拉茨工业大学的研究人员对细菌中发现的一种蛋白质的功能有了新的认识，这种蛋白质的酶活性是由蓝光激活的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/TU-Graz-researchers-gain-new-insights-into-a-light-activated- Protein-switch.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/TU-Graz-researchers-gain-new-insights-into-a-light-activated- Protein-switch.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ed4ec05a-0f5d-40b9-9b86-4715689ffa31 Thu, 03 Aug 2023 09:14:22 -0400 TU Graz researchers gain new insights into a light-activated protein switch
研究发现α5整合素是肌萎缩侧索硬化症的潜在治疗靶点研究人员检查了靶向整合素治疗肌萎缩侧索硬化症 (ALS) 的治疗效果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Study-finds-ceb15-integrin-as-a-pottial-therapeutic-target-in-amyotropic- Lateral-sclerosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Study-finds-ceb15-integrin-as-a-pottial-therapeutic-target-in-amyotropic-terior-sclerosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=569dda02-68c6-4d37-b171-45d52427d86c Thu, 03 Aug 2023 08:42:00 -0400 Study finds α5 integrin as a potential therapeutic target in amyotrophic lateral sclerosis
研究人员发现胆脂瘤的病因中耳的慢性炎症会引起多种问题和并发症，影响人的听力和平衡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Researchers-Discover-Cause-of-Cholesteatomas.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/Researchers-Discover-Cause-of-Cholesteatomas.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=16ccdc32-90be-43d0-84c2-ef00f6ab0778 Thu, 03 Aug 2023 08:42:00 -0400 Researchers discover cause of cholesteatomas
TENS机器可能为睡眠呼吸暂停患者提供新的治疗选择一项临床试验发现，一种常用来缓解疼痛的机器可以改善阻塞性睡眠呼吸暂停患者的呼吸。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/TENS-machine-may-offer-new-treatment-option-for-病人-with-sleep-apnea.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230803/TENS-machine-may-offer-new-treatment-option-for-病人-with-sleep-apnea.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=69056c71-8547-4900-9c56-3c0b12dc112b Thu, 03 Aug 2023 08:33:00 -0400 TENS machine may offer new treatment option for patients with sleep apnea
